text:
I am trying to start tomcat with the following

org.apache.catalina.startup.Bootstrap.main(new String[] { "start" });

it starts up but can not find any classes in the common\lib dir unless I 
explisitly set common\lib in the classpath before starting tomcat

any help would be great.
creator: jakarta@trollingers.com
remm@apache.org
